summary: THE RADIATOR FAILED AND THE FLUID ALL WENT INTO THE TRANSMISSION REQUIRING BOTH A NEW RADIATOR AND TRANSMISSION.  THIS IS A KNOWN PROBLEM WITH 2005 XTERRAS AND NISSAN REFUSES TO COVER THIS FAULTY DESIGN.  WE HAD NO ADVANCE NOTICE OF THIS HAPPENING.  WE WENT OUT ONE DAY AND THE CAR DID NOT START.
